jcurses.event

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcurses.event.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionEvent, ItemEvent, ValueChangedEvent, WindowEvent

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the basic class for all events, that are generated by jcurses widgets.
